isis.stitle: TRW MANUAL STEERING GEAR - REPAIR - SHAFT COVER BUSHING WEAR

svcproc.title: SHAFT COVER BUSHING WEAR
svcproc.para: Inspect shaft cover roller bearing or bushing and the rollershaft outboard bearing surface. Replace "roller bearing" if damaged. If clearance between shaft bearing surface and side cover "bushing" exceeds .010 inch (.25 mm), replace bushing. Remove bearing or bushing with suitable puller. Use a piloted mandrel to install bearing or bushing flush with outer face of bearing boss. A cover "bushing" must be sized to 1.3755 to 1.3765 inch (34.94 to 34.96 mm) diameter after being pressed into side cover. If the facility to size the bushing is not available, it will be necessary to replace the side cover and bushing assembly.
